title: Workplace Communication Competency and Collaborative Mindset Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen collaboration and communication skills required in workplace settings for in-service professionals, utilizing inquiry-based learning and the 5E instructional model (Engagement, Exploration, Explanation, Elaboration, Evaluation)

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective communication strategies based on real workplace scenarios.
Learners enhance problem-solving and decision-making skills through project-based collaboration.
Learners can evaluate their own collaboration methods and communication styles and derive improvement plans through reflective writing.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
